title: Face Watch (KUMAMON Ver.)

descriptionHTML:
This watch face maybe soften your heart with a mischievous look.

- You can select the backgroud color.

Let's set your favorite color background by pastel color circle.

- Expression of KUMAMON change in touch.

KUMAMON of facial expression changes when touched with a finger. KUMAMON will fall asleep when you leave it alone.

- Charm of KUMAMON

In 2011, KUMAMON who a boy of civil servants was born in order to grow up the awareness of Kumamoto Prefecture, and to appeal charm of Kumamoto.

His job is that getting to know everyone across the country to find the surprise and happy in the familiar.

There are present an ardent fan as "Kuma-Tomo" who met the wake of KUMAMON.

He is popular not only in Japan, but also in China and Taiwan. It is also gaining in popularity in Asia, Europe and the United States!

- FAQ

Q1: "Android Wear isn't responding. Do you want to close it? Wait OK" was displayed. How do I?
A1: Please tap "Wait". Depending on the model, the above screen appears.

Q2: Can I use this on Apple_Watch?
A2: This watch face is for Android_Wear.
